starfleet_message: To Captain Picard, USS Enterprise-D: A distress call has been received from a Federation science station orbiting Epsilon IV.

dialogue_tree.line: Captain, long-range sensors have detected epsilon iv station activity.
Captain, defensive systems on Epsilon IV Station are inactive.
Captain, energy fluctuations detected around Epsilon IV Station.

options.label: Run diagnostic sweep
options.crew_reply: La Forge: 'Diagnostics complete. Systems showing instability.'

options.label: Initiate containment field
options.crew_reply: La Forge: 'Containment field active. Levels stabilizing.'

dialogue_tree.line: Captain, Epsilon IV Station's condition is deteriorating rapidly.

debriefs.text: Mission at Epsilon IV Station completed successfully. Crew performance within parameters.
All objectives at Epsilon IV Station achieved with minimal deviation.

Operations at Epsilon IV Station concluded without incident.
Mission at Epsilon IV Station incomplete. Primary objective not met.
Operational errors encountered during Epsilon IV Station response.
Unstable conditions at Epsilon IV Station forced withdrawal.
Data from Epsilon IV Station only partially recovered.
Communication with Epsilon IV Station lost before completion.

All objectives at USS Tsiolkovsky achieved with minimal deviation.
Stabilization efforts at USS Tsiolkovsky effective. Station integrity restored.
Mission data from USS Tsiolkovsky transmitted to Starfleet Command.
Operations at USS Tsiolkovsky concluded without incident.
Mission at USS Tsiolkovsky incomplete. Primary objective not met.
Operational errors encountered during USS Tsiolkovsky response.
Unstable conditions at USS Tsiolkovsky forced withdrawal.
Data from USS Tsiolkovsky only partially recovered.
Communication with USS Tsiolkovsky lost before completion.
